Title: Requires registration of general aviation aircrafts
Summary: Requires registration of general aviation aircrafts; aircrafts used for civil aviation; issuance of certificates of registration; proof of insurance.
LawCode: Add Art 47-A §§2240 - 2245, amd Title 11 Title Head, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring registration of general aviation aircrafts
